item.title: For context, my previous two time trials were 9:46min/mile in November and 8:52min/mile in December. The time trial is running all out as fast as I can for one mile. It‚Äôs hard for me to care about pace but I‚Äôll try for the sake of seeing if I can improve.
item.description: For context, my previous two time trials were 9:46min/mile in November and 8:52min/mile in December. The time trial is running all out as fast as I can for one mile. It‚Äôs hard for me to care about pace but I‚Äôll try for the sake of seeing if I can improve.
